pr_title: Preliminary support of node management and switch assignment

timeline.message: Add Response id in delete API
Support random switch assignments, standardize port creation

timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText: nodemgmt is not a big package. Will update as suggested.
replies.author: xieus

timeline.bodyText: would it be better to set IS_K8S and IS_Onebox to false as default and change it to true when needed?
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText: True, but it doesn't quite matter if hard-coded.. Instead we should update controller config to set up those parameters actually which we will do in next PR.
replies.author: xieus

timeline.bodyText:
nextInt expect a positive number, correct me if I am wrong, what if:
max = -100
min = -1000
max - min = -1100
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText: :) I am not sure now when I look at it this morning...
replies.author: er1cthe0ne

timeline.bodyText: is this function for OneBox only? If yes, it will be better to name this function accordingly.

replies.bodyText: This is for general usage actually. It has been updated with the correct config.
